content:
Attacks of unknown drones in the Russian oil industry are ongoing, the consequences of which are very painful for the enemy.

In the area of Avdiivka there is a real hunt for FPV-Drons for hostile equipment, at the same time Ukrainian border guards effectively destroy "Shahda".

The invaders are pressed in the direction of Novomikhailivka, where the defense of Tavriya paratroopers keep. Probably, the Russians try to go towards the time spring, coal and Liman, but break their teeth through the efforts of the defense forces.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergei Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: New attacks on the refinery, minus the hail of Russian, border guards destroy "Shahda": a stream from the frontline city
description: In the area of Avdiivka there is a real hunt for FPV-Drons for hostile equipment, at the same time ...
author: Army Inform
